1.0.name: wordpress/widgets-controller
1.0.description:
Want to mange your widget the way you want? Well, the widget controller is very imperative application for managing your page-widget. This allows you to show or hide the widgets content just on few mouse clicks. There is no knowledge of PHP required. With the ease of installation, Widgets Controller is a smart plug-in with smart features.

Features

  • Ease of widget maintenance - have the widgets on particular page of your website
  • Active category services - selection of posts and pages can be managed by selecting category services
  • Check All and Uncheck ALL services
  • 404 Page facility
  • Home page and search page facility.

Visit Our Website
